This is episode 14 of the One Bedroom House series, showing you how to draw a small house "From Start To Finish". 

In this video, I will be doing a drainage system layout (drainage plan) for the one bedroom house in AutoCAD Architecture 2020.  My hope is that you will learn the fundamentals so that you can apply them to your own projects.

Thank you all for watching and sharing. 
Give it a like, and subscribe! Oh...drop a camment too!

TIMELINE CONTENT
0:00 - Intro
0:55 - Lesson
3:41 - AutoCAD Tutorial (Drainage system layout)
21:38 - AutoCAD Tutorial (Adding them to our views)
23:00 - The End
